content.question: ​Which of the following expresses the complex number <math alttext="10 plus 10 i"><semantics><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> using polar coordinates in the form <math alttext="open parentheses r cos theta close parentheses plus i open parentheses r sin theta close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>cos</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="open parentheses 1 over 10 cos open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses plus i open parentheses 1 over 10 sin open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mfenced><mrow><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>10</mn></mfrac><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="open parentheses 10 cos 0 close parentheses plus i open parentheses 10 sin open parentheses pi over 2 close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>cos</mi><mn>0</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="open parentheses 10 cos open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses plus i open parentheses 10 sin open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 10 square root of 2 cos open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses plus i open parentheses 10 square root of 2 sin open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses 10 square root of 2 cos open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses plus i open parentheses 10 square root of 2 sin open parentheses pi over 4 close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>i</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>10</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
